column5: Just swapped my grandsons tooth (aka the tooth fairy) for 5 bucks. I used to get a dime.
Wait a minute, I used to get 5 bucks, your grandkids are getting gipped!
don't let my kids see this...
I used to get $1 lol... Kids are spoiled
Hmmm  flip Crosby $20 with a note. No hard feelings.
You can put it on Ebay and recoup your loses Dan.    Art
One of my nephews was bragging last week that between the parents and grandparents he got $50. I offered to help him out if he needed more money!
My niece told me she got $5 last week for a tooth.  $5!!!!   LOL!   I think we used to get a quarter.
I too got a quarter  My daughter the other night for $5 for two teeth coming out the same day.  She pulled the one cause I joked 2 it with $5 and one is worth $1
Now I feel cheap...... I just gave my daughter $2.50 for a molar last week....  Burt
No worries Burtess - My daughter got 2 bucks even from the tooth fairy... and I thought that was high! lol
I was planning to have the tooth fairy leave a bill for her service under my daughters pillow lol
